mapper.select: select readerId from Reader order by readerId desc limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT into Reader (readerId, readerName, phone, email, password) VALUES (#{readerId}, #{readerName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{password})
mapper.update: update Reader set password=#{password} where readerId=#{readerId}
mapper.select: select * from Reader where readerId = #{readerId} and password = #{password}
